 Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days (c) Square-Enix / Eidos
   
       08/2010 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
             1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action
 



 A raw and brutal crime shooter from IO Interactive that redefines the way you
 experience action shooters.Play as two of gaming's most disturbing and
 realistic criminals; Lynch - an impulsive, reckless self-medicated
 psychopath, and Kane - a tactical and calculating ex-mercenary.Experience
 their desperate and frantic fight to escape through the back streets and
 rooftops of Shanghai's gritty underworld. They can trust no one, not even
 each other, as the cracks begin to appear in Lynch's sanity and Kane's
 stability. It's kill or be killed.Intense action in Single Player, online and
 offline Co-op, Fragile Alliance multiplayer and Arcade modes.
